title: Graduate Student Interview
Interview Descriptions: test taken in person in 2019 in the early session. Possibility to take it up to 3 times and then if you don't enter you are done. once you enter everything is smooth
Interview Questions: logic, math and italian but also general knowledge

title: Junior Researcher Interview
Interview Descriptions: Ho sostenuto un colloquio a inizio Ottobre e mi hanno detto che mi avrebbero fatto sapere la settimana seguente. Ho scoperto oggi dopo un mese e diverse mail di follow up che non sono stato preso.

title: Master Interview
Application Type: I applied through college or university. I interviewed at Bocconi University
Interview Descriptions: Domande sulle proprie esperienze precedenti (università triennale e se presente magistrale e contemporanee/successive esperienze lavorative di stage, progetti, scambi o corsi di certificazione se presenti sono un plus), quali sono le proprie aspirazioni professionali e quindi il perché della tua scelta.
Interview Questions:
- Mi parli di lei
- Quali sono le sue aspirazioni/cosa si aspetta dal master

title: Studente Interview
Interview Descriptions: la ammissione per il corso di laurea triennale presso la università bocconi consiste in una prova scritta composta da domande di logica e matematica e comprensione del testo e inglese

title: Intern Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 1 week. I interviewed at Bocconi University in Feb 2021
Interview Descriptions: domande conoscitive per stage in ricerca, solo approfondimento personale non quantitativo/numerico. Professore metteva a proprio agio e il colloquio è durato una 15 di minuti. Fattibile sia per studenti triennale che magistrale
Interview Questions: perchè dovremmo scegliere proprio te per questo progetto?

title: Studente Interview
Application Type: I applied through college or university. I interviewed at Bocconi University
Interview Descriptions: Video Interview dove si chiedevano alcune domande al riguardo della motivazione per entrare al programma magistrale e si faceva riferimento alle esperienze trascorse che potessero essere in linea con il tipo di programma che si andava a svolgere
Interview Questions: Se fossi in una stanza piena di persone, come ti faresti notare?

title: Research Interview
Application Type: I applied through college or university. The process took 3 days. I interviewed at Bocconi University (Milan) in Jan 2019
Interview Descriptions:
One-step interview process for research intern position.
Mainly a cultural and motivation interview, the technical part was only about how much confident with excel and general statistical concepts I was. Got the offer 2 days after via email.
Interview Questions: Why did you choose to apply to this particular research center?

title: Computer Science Tutor Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 2 weeks. I interviewed at Bocconi University (Milan) in Jul 2018
Interview Descriptions: Colloquio in persona presso l'università Bocconi con diverse domande motivazionali, ad esempio descrivi te stesso e i tuoi pregi e i tuoi difetti. Dopo circa una settimana ho ricevuto l'offerta di lavoro via mail.
Interview Questions: Pregi e difetti, descrivi te stesso con degli aggettivi.

title: Researcher Curricular Interview
Application Type: I applied in-person. The process took 5 weeks. I interviewed at Bocconi University in Jan 2018
Interview Descriptions:
face to face interview with Professor in charge of the Research Centre. 
Mostly behavioural questions, but also some techical ones. 
Data analysis skills is stongly recommended.
Showing a good academic track record is important.
Interview Questions: behavioural questions mostly (curricular internship). A bit of technical knowledge specifically related to the kind of project of research is needed.

title: Master Green Managemenr Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 4 weeks. I interviewed at Bocconi University (Milan)
Interview Descriptions: motivation letter, cv, reference letter, bachelor degree, english certificate, 7 minute presentation video, written test/gmat. We had to fill an application online and then go to the university in milan to do the bocconi test. they said someone could have been called for a personal interview. the day of the test we also had to do a english test, it was not planned but it was easy
Interview Questions: why should  we chose you,what can you give to this master,  why you choosed this master? how this master is linked to your past experience?

title: Internship Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 4 weeks. I interviewed at Bocconi University (Milan) in Mar 2015
Interview Descriptions: I was before contacted at the phone for a first interview. Then I had an interview face to face with the hr  the week after, and finally the last interview with the hr and the manager.
Interview Questions: Speak about you. Your previous experience. How did you fix a big problem in your life?

title: Research Assistant Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 4 weeks. I interviewed at Bocconi University (Milan) in Nov 2014
Interview Descriptions: why are you intersted to work for us?, how you can contribute for our organization ? how could you do the best for us? why have you choosen the bocconi than other universities ? why should we hire you than others? are you sure that the bocconi universities is the best choice for your career? please oculd my explain me the why?
Interview Questions: are you intersted to work for us?
